name: Short Puzzle Game - Find my room
name_original: Short Puzzle Game - Find my room
description:
A small little puzzle game in which you collect books in order to find a secret room.
Base Controls:

WASD to move
Left Ctrl => Crouch

Tab => Open Menu

Right Click/E => Pick Up Boxes

Have fun playing around. The game is playable under 5 minutes.

PS: There is a reset button if you get stuck.

Update Log: 

v1.0.1 Improved FPS from 30 -> 40 ~ 50
